sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';

const MasterData = ({ user }) => {
    // Mock data for master data
    const locations = [
        { id: 1, level: 'Region', name: 'Oromia' },
        { id: 2, level: 'Zone', name: 'Arsi' },
        { id: 3, level: 'Woreda', name: 'Tiyo' },
        { id: 4, level: 'Kebele', name: 'Wendo' },
    ];

    const products = [
        { id: 1, name: 'Tractor', category: 'Machinery' },
        { id: 2, name: 'Fertilizer', category: 'Chemical Input' },
    ];

    return ( <
        div >
        <
        h1 className = "text-4xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6" > Master Data < /h1> <
        p className = "text-gray-600 mb-8" > Manage products and locations within your scope. < /p>

        { /* Locations Table */ } <
        div className = "bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6 mb-8" >
        <
        h3 className = "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4" > Locations < /h3> <
        table className = "min-w-full divide-y divide-gray-200" >
        <
        thead className = "bg-gray-50" >
        <
        tr >
        <
        th className = "px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider" > Level < /th> <
        th className = "px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider" > Name < /th> <
        /tr> <
        /thead> <
        tbody className = "bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200" > {
            locations.map((loc) => ( <
                tr key = { loc.id } >
                <
                td className = "px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-medium text-gray-900" > { loc.level } < /td> <
                td className = "px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500" > { loc.name } < /td> <
                /tr>
            ))
        } <
        /tbody> <
        /table> <
        /div>

        { /* Products Table */ } <
        div className = "bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6" >
        <
        h3 className = "text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4" > Product Types < /h3> <
        table className = "min-w-full divide-y divide-gray-200" >
        <
        thead className = "bg-gray-50" >
        <
        tr >
        <
        th className = "px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider" > Name < /th> <
        th className = "px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider" > Category < /th> <
        /tr> <
        /thead> <
        tbody className = "bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200" > {
            products.map((prod) => ( <
                tr key = { prod.id } >
                <
                td className = "px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-medium text-gray-900" > { prod.name } < /td> <
                td className = "px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500" > { prod.category } < /td> <
                /tr>
            ))
        } <
        /tbody> <
        /table> <
        /div> <
        /div>
    );
};

export default MasterData;
